refsect2.title: The “change-channel-pressure” signal
refsect2.programlisting: gpointer user_function (AgsMidiParser *midi_parser, guint Returns, gpointer user_data)

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The XML node representing the event
The ::change-channel-pressure signal is emited during parsing of event.
